body.name: That Forever Feeling & Security Blanket (Harlequin Bestselling Author Collection)
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by glenthebookseller.
editorialReviews: Editorial Reviews About the Author Linda Lael Miller is a #1 New York Times and USA TODAY bestselling author of more than one hundred novels. Long passionate about the Civil War buff, she has studied the era avidly and has made many visits to Gettysburg, where she has witnessed reenactments of the legendary clash between North and South. Linda explores that turbulent time in The Yankee Widow.USA Today bestselling author, Delores Fossen, is a former Air Force officer who’s sold over 150 novels. She's received the Booksellers' Best Award for romantic suspense, the Romantic Times Reviewers' Choice Award and was a finalist for the Rita ®. In addition, she's had nearly a hundred short stories and articles published in national magazines.You can contact the author through her webpage at www.deloresfossen.com
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 7 mins
body.description: BESTSELLING AUTHOR COLLECTIONReader-favorite romances in collectible volumes from our bestselling authors.That Forever Feeling by #1 New York Times bestselling authorLinda Lael Miller, previously published as Daring MovesAmanda Scott is wary of love ever since she fell for a married man. Deciding to focus on her career, Amanda dreams of opening up her own bed-and-breakfast on picturesque Vashon Island. But with little money to fund her plans, the goal seems far out of reach.A run-in with widower Jordan Richards troubles Amanda in a different way: she thought she could keep a friendly distance between them but soon finds she's falling again. Painful pasts make it difficult for Jordan and Amanda to believe love is an option for them—could risking a romance be a mistake? FREE BONUS STORY INCLUDED IN THIS VOLUME!Security Blanket by USA TODAY bestselling author Delores FossenP.I. Quinn "Lucky" Bacelli has finally tracked down Marin Sheppard, a woman who knows more about her missing criminal brother than she admits. Someone is willing to kill Marin and her son to get information, and when Lucky learns of Marin's dangerous past, he offers a pretend engagement as protection. But it's a risky situation and Lucky has everything to lose...Previously published.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It will keep you on the edge of your seat
reviews.reviewText: I loved the mystery of not knowing who is after the two main characters until you get close to the end. I couldn't put my tablet down

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Duplicate story of the title "Daring Moves"
reviews.reviewText: Always love Miller's stories .. was caught without checking couples names that I record in my library list .. already had bought & read this story under the title "Daring Moves" back in 2019 .. sigh .. still a great story tho .. will check out the bonus story before I decide whether to keep or delete this book . or the other duplicate

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not returning as 2nd book incl have not read an refund isn’t worth the trouble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Just Okay to read.
reviews.reviewText: I was disappointed in this re-print. It was condensed so much that there really wasn't much plot. I read in one setting and it felt like a Hallmark movie...way too simple. Sex was put in to fill word count or pages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This book is a re-release and very old at that. I agree with another reviewer who felt ripped off because i was made to believe this was a new one. And then only half was Linda. There was another story included by a unknown author.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I hate when they reinvent an old book and make you are buying something new. It should be clearly stated that these are republished books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great writer never disappoints.
